content: Black plays E8 and captures the white stone on D8. On E8, the black stone is at Ko, that is, on the next move, White will be prohibited from capturing it by playing D8. White then plays E2, practically forcing Black to play E1. Now White can play D8 and capture the Ko stone.
translations: ita:Il nero gioca in E8 e cattura la pietra bianca in D8. In E8, la pietra nera è in Ko, cioè, nella prossima mossa, al Bian
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
